name: Armies of Riddle E.X. (Extreme)
description:
Welcome to the world of Riddle in the Solar system of Ryina!

Armies of Riddle EX (Extreme) is a Fantasy RPG MOBA game which aspires to bring a new variation to eSports games, namely additional strategy. The goal of AoREX (Armies of Riddle EX) is to one day become a popular eSports game with additional strategic items and more fun storyline and be the first of its kind with these new strategic features and functionalities.

Players can expect to have a highly crafted storyline around fun and engaging gameplay and eSports competitive multiplayer battles. From domination maps to 5v5 team battle modes and future custom modes, AoREX aims to become a game truly for players to enjoy the world of eSports in a new and fun way!

GAMEPLAY (Proposed and being built into the game):
-The goal of the game is to destroy your opponents base which is located on the opposite sides of the game map (In general MOBA style)
-Players can control between 1-5 main player units and use them to attack their opponents
-What makes the game unique is our Strategy system which allows players to SPECIFY:
a. When their army units are generated (The longer you keep them held, the more powerful they get, however you risk having your opponent make more leg way into your territory).
b. Where on the map their home base is
c. When to release their BEAST unit (Each team has only ONE beast. Once used it cannot be used again).
-Using various methods and strategies, players must defend their bases while trying to attack and destroy their opponents bases.
-Each map varies in both complexity and style and landform. Over time many more maps will be added. This style of gameplay we are calling DOMINATION MAPS.
-We have an additional set of gameplay types proposed as well in the future, including 5v5 third person style gameplay

FEATURES (Proposed, however not built as yet, still in development):
-Storyline Gameplay
-Cards and Unlocking of Players via their battle cards
-Collecting of avatars
-Upgrading of avatars
-Multiplayer eSports gameplay via various map styles, specifically Domaination being the main one followed by many others
-First of its kind Strategy within the MOBA space!
-New features and ideas by YOU the players!

The goal is to make a game truly for the players to enjoy and get ongoing feedback from the community and thus upgrade and update the game over time.

Currently it is in heavy development and available for Steam Early Access!
